text: Lypsimena tomentosa is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Chemsak and Linsley in 1978. It is known from Venezuela.BioLib.cz - Lypsimena tomentosa. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1978
title: Lypsimena tomentosa
